task.title: How to select a cruise
task.shortdesc: On the Carnival homepage, you will enter cruise specifics to find the correct cruise to sign up for this spring break.

step.cmd: Click on the "Sail to" button and select the "Bahamas" option.
Click on the "Sail from" button and select the "Orlando" option.
Click on the "Dates" button and select March 5 to March 8.
Follow the steps to register for the cruise.
